__e: The guys we're after had to have learned the details of the original heists somewhere, right?
Uh, we were just wondering, Uh, if there was anything in particular We were looking for, with regards to the carjackings.
Now, I'm personally familiar with Lynch's MO and though normally art theft isn't really his thing, this particular robbery seems to have his mark on it all right.

The crime scene's contaminated, the bat's out of evidence, we found nothing at the robberies, our witness can't identify the killer, and he threw away his weapon, which, according to all records, he'd never done before.
I have a lot to tell you about these robberies, and there were many, but the best job I ever did was in Spain.
Or find out I gotta become a hobo and go broke...
